document_data.mainbody:
essa was the displacer beast servant of the orthon Yurgir for a time during the late 15 century DR.
She was wholly devoted to her master, even to the detriment of her own self-determination.
Nessa possessed darkvision and like others of her kind was exceptionally evasive in battle.
Nessa believed herself to be Yurgirs "heart-jewel", that they were true loves. Unfortunately, Yurgir had been ordering his merregon quartermaster to dose Nessas meal with a concoction that included succubus spittle. That treatment incited Nessas adoration for the orthon, and ensured her loyalty as a fighting companion.
She remained with Yurgir in the Gauntlet of Shar for some time, up until at least the .
